paramInformation.label: Sensitivity
paramInformation.description: Sensitivity sets the amount of motion required for EZMotion to detect motion.

paramInformation.label: On Time
paramInformation.description: Sets the number of minutes the lights stay on when motion has not been detected.

paramInformation.label: LED On/Off
paramInformation.description: LED ON/OFF turns the LED on or off.

paramInformation.label: Light Threshold
paramInformation.description: Light Threshold is the % of light above which the lights will not be turned on.

paramInformation.label: On Value
paramInformation.description: The value sent by the Z-Wave BASIC_SET command when motion is detected.
